title: How Many Calories in a Brat?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a brat, including full nutrition breakdown per bratwurst, protein, fat, carbs, and easy tweaks for your meal.
h1: How Many Calories in a Brat?
assumptions: Standard pork bratwurst sausage, cooked (grilled), one link (~85 g), no bun or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, meat type, size, cooking method, and seasonings. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One cooked bratwurst provides ~297 kcal and ~14 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add to a hot dog bun
Beer-braised (adds minimal calories from beer absorption)

faqs.q: How many calories in a bratwurst?
faqs.a: About 297 kcal for one standard cooked pork bratwurst.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a brat?

faqs.a: Yes, ~25 g total fat per brat, with 9 g saturated.

faqs.q: How does cooking method affect calories in a brat?
faqs.a: Grilling or boiling keeps calories similar; frying adds ~50-100 kcal from oil.

faqs.q: What's the sodium content in a brat?
faqs.a: Approximately 740 mg sodium per bratwurst, varying by brand.
